concise_definition: n. (专有名词) 邓汉（姓氏）

definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, historically associated with places named Dunham in England, such as Dunham Massey or Dunham-on-Trent. It is used as a family name by individuals and families across the English-speaking world.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自英格兰的姓氏，历史上与英格兰名为 Dunham 的地点相关，如 Dunham Massey 或 Dunham-on-Trent。该姓氏被英语国家的个人和家族使用。
definitions.example_en: The actress Lena Dunham is known for creating and starring in the TV series 'Girls'.
definitions.example_cn: 女演员莉娜·邓纳姆因创作并主演电视剧《女孩》而闻名。
